text: "I Never Cry" is a 1976 song by Alice Cooper and was taken from his studio album Alice Cooper Goes to Hell. It went to number 12 in the United States, number 5 in Canada and number 23 in Australia. It was covered by Poison in 2007. ==References== Category:1976 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Soft rock songs Category:Alice Cooper songs Category:Poison (band) songs
title: I Never Cry
